column4: can you suggest me some beginners reading about ubuntu. I have read some mini manuals, and a book about bash. What am I to read next?
what do you want to do with linux/ubuntu. Your reading will be dictated by what you want to achieve
i presume you dont want to be limited to jsut ubuntu in that case. I would suggest looking at kernel compilation. learn how to compile a kernel, first under ubuntu, but also under other distros
and just write little shell scripts to make life easier for yourself, log analysis, that kind of thing
